------------------------------------
Description
------------------------------------


This is my first  follower mod .
I made a StandAlone Follower MOD for testing.

I'll add a female follower "Elicia" in Bernard-Mare.

She is good at close combat.


------------------------------------
RECOMMENDED
------------------------------------


[Face Light] by [b]tktk[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/

[ENB]
